34#ifndef _zzzzzz_RCFILE_H_
35#define _zzzzzz_RCFILE_H_
36
37struct rcfile;
38
39/*
40 * A unified options parser
41 */
42enum opt_argtype {OPTARG_STR, OPTARG_INT, OPTARG_BOOL};
43
44struct opt_args;
45
46typedef int opt_callback_t (struct opt_args*);
47
48#define OPTFL_NONE 0x0000
49#define OPTFL_HAVEMIN 0x0001
50#define OPTFL_HAVEMAX 0x0002
51#define OPTFL_MINMAX NAFL_HAVEMIN | NAFL_HAVEMAX
52
53struct opt_args {
54 enum opt_argtype type;
55 int opt; /* command line option */
56 char * name; /* rc file equiv */
57 int flag; /* OPTFL_* */
58 int ival; /* int/bool values, or max len for str value */
59 char * str; /* string value */
60 int min; /* min for ival */
61 int max; /* max for ival */
62 opt_callback_t *fn; /* call back to validate */
63};
64
65extern int cf_opterr, cf_optind, cf_optopt, cf_optreset;
66extern const char *cf_optarg;
67
68__BEGIN_DECLS
69
70int opt_args_parse(struct rcfile *, struct opt_args *, const char *,
71 opt_callback_t *);
72int opt_args_parseopt(struct opt_args *, int, char *, opt_callback_t *);
73
74int cf_getopt(int, char * const *, const char *);
75
76int rc_open(const char *, const char *, struct rcfile **);
77int rc_close(struct rcfile *);
78int rc_merge(const char *, struct rcfile **);
79int rc_getstringptr(struct rcfile *, const char *, const char *, char **);
80int rc_getstring(struct rcfile *, const char *, const char *, size_t, char *);
81int rc_getint(struct rcfile *, const char *, const char *, int *);
82int rc_getbool(struct rcfile *, const char *, const char *, int *);
83
84__END_DECLS
85
86#endif /* _zzzzzz_RCFILE_H_ */
87
